<h3 id="X38140">X(38140) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(5), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^4-(b+c)*a^3+2*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-4*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38140) = X(1)-7*X(3851) = X(3)-7*X(7989) = X(3)+5*X(18492) = 2*X(3)+X(33697) = 2*X(4)+X(3579) = 3*X(4)+X(9778) = 5*X(4)+7*X(9780) = X(4)+2*X(9956) = 5*X(5)-2*X(1125) = 4*X(5)-X(1385) = 3*X(5)-2*X(10171) = 2*X(5)+X(18480) = X(5)+2*X(19925) = 7*X(5)-X(34773) = 3*X(5)-X(38028) = 3*X(3579)-2*X(9778) = 5*X(3579)-14*X(9780) = X(3579)-4*X(9956) = 7*X(7989)+5*X(18492) = 14*X(7989)+X(33697) = X(9778)-6*X(9956) = X(9778)-3*X(26446) = 7*X(9780)-10*X(9956) = 7*X(9780)-5*X(26446) = 10*X(18492)-X(33697)</b>

<p>
X(38140) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 26446}, {165, 3830}, {355, 5603}, {381, 5587}, {946, 38155}, {1699, 5790}, {3654, 9812}, {3845, 38042}, {10165, 34648}, {10247, 37712}, {10742, 11219}, {11230, 18480}, {14269, 19875}, {38034, 38138}<br>
X(38140) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (549, 10172), (1385, 11230), (3579, 26446), (3817, 5066), (5603, 9955), (10165, 547), (11230, 5), (11231, 10175), (17502, 2), (24680, 5603), (26446, 9956), (38028, 10171), (38155, 18357)<br>
X(38140) = X(33697)-Gibert-Moses centroid<br>
X(38140) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 9956, 3579), (5, 18480, 1385), (5, 19925, 18480), (5, 38028, 10171), (10, 546, 22793), (381, 5790, 1699), (382, 1698, 31663), (1656, 5691, 13624), (1699, 5587, 5790), (3585, 17606, 37582), (3832, 5818, 12699), (3850, 18357, 946), (3857, 22791, 12571), (3858, 5690, 18483), (7989, 18492, 3), (9581, 9654, 5045), (10171, 38028, 11230), (10175, 11231, 38083), (10246, 19709, 7988), (10826, 10895, 942), (10827, 10896, 9957), (37712, 38021, 10247), (38071, 38138, 38034), (38161, 38162, 3817)<br>
